description: Creates 2D floor plans from floors provided by another function.
name: PlansByFloors

inputs.name: Ground Floor Rooms
inputs.description: Quantity of rooms on the ground floor.

inputs.name: Typical Rooms Per Upper Floor
inputs.description: Quantity of rooms on a typical floor.

outputs.name: Ground Floor Room Quantity
outputs.description: Quantity of rooms on the ground floor.

outputs.name: Typical Floor Room Quantity
outputs.description: Quantity of rooms on the ground floor.

outputs.name: Upper Floor Room Quantity
outputs.description: Quantity of rooms on all upper floors.

outputs.name: Upper Floor Area
outputs.description: Total area for all upper floors.
